pages.text: The 3rd tab from left in Maid GUI is Maid Bauble Inventory. The mod provides several maid baubles that can protect maids to a certain extent: $(li)Ultramarine Orb Elixir: similar to Totem of Undying, it will prevent Maid from death for up to 6 times. $(li)Bauble of Tomb: Generate a tomb in-place that contains all items dropped by the maid upon death.
$(li)Bauble of Protection/Resistence (?): cancel all damages received by maids bearing this bauble.
